description: Acquisition of a CNS analyzer including all components and software required for its operation, as well as delivery, installation and training
full_summary:
***Government Tender Announcement***
 # 01396-240501 : Request for Proposal (RFP) - CNS Analyzer (Carbon, Nitrogen, Sulphur)
 
 ### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4345149687-Doc4345175273
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4345149687
* **Publication Date**: December 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024 at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Amendment Date**: January 15, 2024

### Tender Description

PSPC, on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Quebec City Research and Development Centre, invites proposals for the acquisition of a CNS analyzer (Carbon, Nitrogen, Sulphur) that includes all required components and software. The tender also requires delivery, installation and training services.

The proposed CNS analyzer must meet specific performance and functional requirements as outlined in the solicitation document.

### Tender Methods

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive and Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

The tender is open to Canadian businesses. However, the end-user of the CNS analyzer is located in Quebec (except the National Capital Region).

### Regions of Delivery

Delivery of the CNS analyzer will be to the National Research Council in Quebec City.

### Contact Information

Inquiries and proposals should be directed to:

Alina Cocieru (elle-la / she-her)
Email: alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18232024?extsite=MTgyMzIwMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Notice URL

Please access the Discovery website for more details about this request for proposal. The notice URL is located in the contact information section.
